      • mainForm

        public static void mainForm​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns to Main form
        Parameters:
        event - When cancel button is clicked while filling out a form, or after part or product is successfully saved
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Main form is unable to load

      • addPartForm

                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Opens Add Part form
        Parameters:
        event - Add button clicked in Part pane of Main form
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Add Part form is unable to load

      • checkAssociatedParts

        public static boolean checkAssociatedParts​(Product selectedProduct)
        Checks to see if a selected product has associated parts
        Parameters:
        selectedProduct - Product selected in Product table in Main form
        Returns:
        True if product has associated parts; false if product does not have associated parts

      • checkIfEmpty

        public static void checkIfEmpty​(java.lang.String string)
        Checks if a required text field is empty
        Parameters:
        string - String in a text field (technically can be used for any string, not just text fields)

      • checkIfPositive

        public static void checkIfPositive​(int i)
        Checks if a text field requiring an integer does not have a positive number and displays error if such occurs
        Parameters:
        i - Int in a text field (technically can be used for any int, not just text fields)

      • checkIfPositive

        public static void checkIfPositive​(double i)
        Checks if a text field requiring a double does not have a positive number and displays error if such occurs
        Parameters:
        i - Double in a text field (technically can be used for any double, not just text fields)

      • checkName

        public static void checkName​(javafx.scene.control.TextField f)
        Checks to make sure text fields expecting strings are not empty
        Parameters:

      • checkInt

        public static void checkInt​(javafx.scene.control.TextField f)
        Checks text fields expecting integer values to make sure the field is not empty, is an integer, and is positive
        Parameters:
        f - Text field being checked

      • checkPrice

        public static void checkPrice​(javafx.scene.control.TextField f)
        Checks text fields expecting double values to make sure the field is not empty, is an integer, and is positive
        Parameters:
        f - Text field being checked

      • checkInHouse

        public static void checkInHouse​(javafx.scene.control.TextField f)
        Checks text fields expecting integer values to make sure the field is not empty, is an integer, and is positive Similar to checkInt, but decided to keep separate because of cases when checkInt is used and In-House is not selected
        Parameters:
        f - Text field being checked

      • checkMaxMinInv

        public static void checkMaxMinInv​(javafx.scene.control.TextField maxF,
                                  javafx.scene.control.TextField minF,
                                  int invInt)
        Checks Max, Min, and Inv fields if Max < Min, Max < Inv, and/or Inv < Min, and displays error if such occurs RUNTIME ERROR: Technically not an error, but a bug. For some reason, this program was not throwing exceptions on its own like the above checks, so IllegalArgumentExceptions were manually added because the program kept saving invalid Max/Min/Inv values without them.
        Parameters:
        maxF - Max text field
        minF - Min text field
        invInt - Inv text field
